content: this legal text describes the progress of a case that lasted for 7 years the court ruled in favor of the plaintiff and dismissed the objections raised by the defendants the court ordered the dissolution of the community property and assigned specific properties to each party involved they also ordered the payment of certain sums of money to the parties the court applied legal principles related to the constitution of the italian republic and the civil procedure code they addressed issues of inheritance and the validity of certain deeds the court rejected the defendants objections and upheld the estimates made by the courtappointed technical consultant they dismissed the defendants claims for reimbursement of expenses and ordered fair compensation to the plaintiff for the exclusive occupation of the common property the court also ordered the payment of litigation costs in favor of the plaintiff in this case the court in lecce made several rulings including dismissing preliminary exceptions ordering the dissolution of community property assigning specific properties and adjusting payment amounts they also ordered the transcription of the order by the registrar of real estate records monetary sums were ordered to be paid by certain parties and litigation costs were condemned to be paid by the defendants the court also placed the costs of the courtappointed technical consultant on the parties involved
